Russia welcomes North Korean foreign minister for talks on deepening tiesNorth Korean Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui is in Russia this week for talks with her counterpart, Sergei Lavrov, as the two countries deepen economic, political, and military ties. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 04:14:24 GMT COCZBZ4FDBIUPEVLOHNHX5SFCM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ Russia-welcomes-north-korean-foreign-minister-talks-deepening-ties-2024-01-15/Josh Smith世界亚太地区
Australian foreign minister calls for 'sustainable ceasefire' at start of Middle East tourAustralia's foreign minister called on Monday for a "sustainable ceasefire" in Gaza as she left for a Middle East tour that includes a visit to the occupied West Bank and meetings with the families of Israeli hostages. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:39:32 GMT VGAJJ73QONJRFHXML6SJBU25QI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/australian-foreign-minister-calls-sustainable-ceasefire-start-middle-east-tour-2024-01-15/Lewis Jackson世界中东
Former China Everbright Group chairman arrested on suspicion of corruption -state mediaA former chairman of state-owned financial conglomerate China Everbright Group, Tang Shuangning, was arrested on suspicion of taking bribes and corruption, state media reported on Monday, citing China’s top prosecutor. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:38:26 GMT RYFMQCC6F5O43GHKV7E3FP4URY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/former-china-everbright-group-chairman-arrested-suspicion-corruption-state-media-2024-01-15/Reuters世界中国
Former US official says commitment to Taiwan 'rock solid'The United States looks forward to continuity in the Taiwan-U.S. relationship under the new Taiwanese administration and the U.S. commitment to the island is "rock solid", a former senior U.S. official told Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:35:00 GMT 3B2BAWO2ZZL6LKL5F5YXS4K2LE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-says-commitment-taiwan-rock-solid-looks-forward-continuity-2024-01-15/Ben Blanchard, Fabian Hamacher世界亚太地区
US says it shot down anti-ship cruise missile from Houthi-controlled areasU.S. fighter aircraft shot down an anti-ship cruise missile fired from Houthi militant areas of Yemen toward a U.S. destroyer operating in the Southern Red Sea, the U.S. military said on Sunday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:15:25 GMT DOVSKEDYU5LEDHW5N67YZNCNVI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-says-it-shot-down-anti-ship-cruise-missile-houthi-control-areas-2024-01-15/Reuters世界中东
Tourists stranded by avalanches in China's Xinjiang lifted to safety by helicopterSome tourists stranded for several days after avalanches hit highways leading to a popular winter tourism area in China's northwest region of Xinjiang were lifted by helicopter to safety, according to local media reports on Sunday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:04:59 GMT VUKAWGLRKBJA3LZUJ5YX4RBVZU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/tourists-stranded-by-avalanches-chinas-xinjian-lifted-safety-by-helicopter-2024-01-15/Reuters世界中国
Vietnam's top leader attends parliament session after health concernsVietnam's top leader, Communist Party head Nguyen Phu Trong, on Monday attended a session of the National Assembly after concerns had been raised for days over his health. China urges larger-scale Gaza peace conference as conflict escalatesChina's Foreign Minister Wang Yi called for a larger, more authoritative Israeli-Palestinian peace conference and a timetable to implement a two-state solution as the Gaza conflict escalated and the Red Sea became a new flash point. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 00:26:28 GMT大众WLYTPCPJKFNGFLNTZRO6K5OM https://www.reuters.com/world/china-calls-larger-scale-peace-conference-gaza-crisis-wang-yi-2024-01-15/Reuters世界
Pope defends same-sex blessings declaration, says it is misunderstoodPope Francis on Sunday defended a landmark decision approving blessings for same-sex couples, suggesting that those in the Catholic Church who have resisted it have jumped to "ugly conclusions" because they do not understand it. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 00:19:13 GMT 3PISHVWWNFP5FGOSZC6J5DLA7I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-defends-same-sex-blessings-declaration-says-it-is-misunderstood-2024-01-15/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
UK commits 20,000 military personnel for NATO exercise in EuropeBritain will commit 20,000 military personnel to serve across Europe in a major NATO exercise in the first half of this year, as well as warships and fighter jets, the defence ministry said on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 00:13:33 GMT ISEW2COFMNNQBAYSRUD255X7YY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/uk-commits-20000-military-personnel-nato-exercise-europe-2024-01-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Tractors converge on Berlin for farmers' protestFarmers and their tractors rumbled towards Berlin from every corner of Germany on Sunday ahead of a giant protest demanding a rethink of plans to tax farmers more. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 22:05:40 GMT RTNR7JFVCVPARFUYUAU27ICDTA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/tractors-converge-berlin-farmers-protest-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
